dialogues.name: Soren
dialogues.dialogueText: Oy, Breya, hand me the wrench! The brass piping is coming loose on the furnace.

dialogues.name: Breya
dialogues.dialogueText: Oh! Uh... Here it is Mr. Soren!

dialogues.name: Soren
dialogues.dialogueText: Ah, finally done! This baby will be keeping someone warm for the winter. Now, what were you trying to tell me earlier?

dialogues.name: Breya
dialogues.dialogueText: I was just reminding you that I am leaving work early today. Emilia and I are planning on going scavenging tonight.

dialogues.name: Soren
dialogues.dialogueText: Hmph right. You did put in extra work yesterday... Very well. How long until you leave?

dialogues.name: Breya
dialogues.dialogueText: I still have about two hours.

dialogues.name: Soren
dialogues.dialogueText: Then help me patch up this exhaust vent until then. Its hinges have come loose.
